data.title: OKX to unveil pre-market perpetual futures for Canton Network (CC) on Oct 31, 2025, offering enhanced trading options with USDT margin.
data.description: Starting on October 31, 2025, OKX will offer USDT-margined pre-market perpetual futures for Canton Network (CC), providing enhanced trading options for users. This initiative will introduce advanced trading capabilities for interested parties.

data.title: BTC ends October 2025 with a 3.5% drop, unusual for the month. Market trends and BTC's future discussed.
data.description: In October 2025, Bitcoin (BTC) saw a 3.5% decrease, an unusual decline for the month. Analysts are examining key occurrences and forecasting the future trajectory of BTC.

data.title: ASTER price drops below $1 post buyback & burn strategy announcement, stirring market caution among traders for long-term impact.
data.description: The price of Aster has dropped to less than $1 after the announcement of a buyback and burn plan designed to increase the token's value. Traders are proceeding with caution as they assess the long-term implications of this move.

data.title: XRP's future uncertain with ETF talks and regulatory issues. Price volatile, resistance at $2.70.
data.description: Investors are closely monitoring the fluctuating price of XRP amid discussions regarding a potential ETF debut and regulatory obstacles. The cryptocurrency faces significant resistance at the $2.70 mark, suggesting high market tension and uncertainty. In this climate, market participants are analyzing the implications of these factors on XRP's value, leading to increased volatility in its price movement.

data.title: Allegations against Binance's Zhao cleared. On-chain analysis shows manipulated screenshots in $35M ASTER token transfer claim.
data.description: Claims against Binance's Changpeng Zhao regarding a $35 million ASTER token transfer have been debunked through on-chain analysis, which found manipulated screenshots as the basis of the allegations. The investigations have cleared Zhao of any wrongdoing in the alleged transaction.

data.title: Canaan Inc. stops ATM sales post $7.8M raise for growth and financial goals until 2025.
data.description: Canaan Inc. has recently bolstered its at-the-market offering, securing $7.8 million in funds. The company has decided to halt additional sales under this program until 2025. This move aims to direct attention towards strategic expansion and enhancing financial adaptability.

data.title: Bitcoin (BTC) sees first negative October in 7 years, 5.51% drop linked to macro uncertainty and ETF outflows.
data.description: Bitcoin's performance in October is poised to be the worst since 2018, as it has seen a 5.51% drop in its price. This decline is mainly linked to macroeconomic uncertainty and ETF outflows.

data.title: Senators prioritize the CLARITY Act for crypto market regulation as U.S. government shutdown continues.
data.description: During the ongoing government shutdown, U.S. senators are fast-tracking talks on the CLARITY Act, aiming to create a regulatory structure for digital assets. The act aims to provide clarity and guidelines in the fast-evolving digital asset space. This move comes as the shutdown persists, impacting various government functions. The act has gained significant attention, with discussions focused on shaping regulations for the growing digital asset market. The initiative underscores the need for a regulatory framework amid increasing interest and investments in digital assets.

data.title: dYdX heads to US, cutting fees and making strategic acquisitions, meeting regulatory changes, with launch by year-end.
data.description: By the end of this year, dYdX plans to launch its services in the United States. The platform will provide lower trading fees compared to competitors, alongside strategic growth initiatives. This move comes amidst regulatory changes and advancements in infrastructure.

data.title: 0 Fee Carnival for USDC and USD1 transfers on BNB Chain now extended until November 30, 2025. Enjoy gas-free stablecoin transfers on supported platforms.
data.description: BNB Chain has announced an extension of their 0 Fee Carnival for USDC and USD1 transfers, now running until November 30, 2025. This initiative enables users to transfer stablecoins without incurring any gas fees when operating on compatible platforms.

data.title: BNB Chain surpasses TRON in stablecoin transactions, now dominates 47% of DEX market share, per ARK Invest.
data.description: According to data from ARK Invest, BNB Chain has surpassed TRON to become the top network for stablecoin transactions, now holding 47% of the decentralized exchange (DEX) market.

data.title: Binance backs AI16Z token change to ELIZAOS, boost AI ecosystem. Swap on Nov 6, 2025.
data.description: Binance has revealed its backing for AI16Z's rebranding to ELIZAOS, signifying a major transition in AI-driven token networks. The conversion is scheduled for November 6, 2025, ushering in a new era for the technology ecosystem.

data.title: HKMA alerts public against phishing SMS scams claiming to be from them, involving fake insurance activation. Beware!
data.description: The Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) is warning the public about phishing SMS messages pretending to be from the authority. They are specifically alerting people about a scam related to fake insurance service activation. The HKMA advises individuals to exercise caution when receiving such messages. This comes after a recent incident where individuals were targeted in this manner. It is essential for the public to be vigilant and verify the authenticity of messages claiming to be from the HKMA to avoid falling victim to scams.

data.title: CIO predicts Solana's growth like Bitcoin's early days, highlights potential in market expansion and infrastructure.
data.description: Bitwise's Chief Investment Officer, Matt Hougan, drew parallels between Solana's impressive growth potential and the early trajectory of Bitcoin. He highlighted the cryptocurrency's unique dual prospects for growth in both market expansion and infrastructure dominance. Hougan's comparison underscores the significant opportunities that Solana presents in the current market landscape.

data.title: Amount of Solana inflows falls to $180M; faces difficulties surpassing $200 mark despite new ETFs.
data.description: In the past six months, Solana has experienced a decline in spot inflows to $180 million, reaching a low point. This comes as the cryptocurrency faces challenges in sustaining a price exceeding $200, even with the introduction of new ETFs.

data.title: Phishing attack on BNB Chain leads to $13K hack on X accounts; all affected users will be fully compensated.
data.description: BNB Chain recently revealed that a phishing attack led to a $13,000 hack affecting X number of accounts. They have committed to providing full compensation to all impacted users.

data.title: Financial Crime Unit freezes $300M, boosting crypto crime fight. T3, a partnership involving Tether, TRON, and TRM Labs, takes action.
data.description: A joint effort by the T3 Financial Crime Unit, consisting of Tether, TRON, and TRM Labs, has successfully halted the movement of more than $300 million in assets. This development represents a crucial stride in the ongoing fight against cryptocurrency-related criminal activities on a global scale.

data.title: Bavarian Nordic clarifies on HERA framework agreement for Public Preparedness business.
data.description: Bavarian Nordic A/S based in Copenhagen, Denmark, released a statement on November 1, 2025, to provide further details about the recent announcement regarding the Health Emergency Preparedness and Response Authority (HERA) framework agreement. This agreement was disclosed yesterday and pertains to their Public Preparedness business segment.

data.title: Kite (KITE) is the 71st project to join Binance Launchpool, an AI-focused blockchain platform supported by PayPal and General Catalyst.
data.description: Binance recently revealed Kite (KITE) as the 71st project on its Launchpool. This new addition showcases an AI-centric blockchain platform supported by giants like PayPal and General Catalyst. Investors can learn more about this significant development.

data.title: HK Monetary Authority reveals a 1.3% rise in total deposits for September 2025. Renminbi deposits & cross-border trade show significant growth.
data.description: In September 2025, total deposits in Hong Kong saw a 1.3% rise according to the Hong Kong Monetary Authority. Renminbi deposits and cross-border trade settlements experienced significant growth, indicating a positive trend in the region's financial activities.
